reference.title: Data-element attributes group
reference.shortdesc: The data element attributes group includes attributes that are defined for the data element, and are reused on most or all specializations of the data element.

dlentry.dd: Describes the type of data contained in the value attribute or within the data element. A typical use of datatype will be the identifying URI for an XML Schema datatype.
Defines a unique name for the object.
Specifies a value associated with the current property or element.
